Unit: Squad¶

class battle.Squad(solders, vehicles)¶

Squad consists of instances of class Solder and Vehicles

Parameters:units ((list)) – Number of solders and vehicles in the squad.
get_health()¶
Returns:Total health of all units in the squad.
get_power()¶
Returns:Total atack value of all units in the squad.
take_damage(attack_value)¶

Spreads damage among all units in the squad.

Parameters:attack_value ((float)) – Value of damage to be taken.
